children.summary: Measures the acceleration applied to the device. All values are in SI units (m/s^2).
Set the mimimum threshold to determine if a new reading is signal or noise.
children.title: Noise Threshold
Accelerometer Probe

children.summary: Measures angular speed around each axis.
Set the mimimum threshold to determine if a new reading is signal or noise.
children.title: Noise Threshold
Gyroscope Probe

children.summary: Detects the ambient light level in SI lux units.
Set the mimimum threshold to determine if a new reading is signal or noise.
children.title: Noise Threshold
Light Probe

children.summary: Records the most accurate location available for the device, given device limitations and respecting battery life.
children.title: Location Probe

children.summary: Detect the local magnetic field. Can be used as to detect the earth's magnetic field, but may be distorted by metal objects around device.
Set the mimimum threshold to determine if a new reading is signal or noise.
children.title: Noise Threshold
Magnetic Field Probe

children.summary: Records the pressure on the touch screen of the devices.
Set the mimimum threshold to determine if a new reading is signal or noise.
children.title: Noise Threshold
Pressure Probe

children.summary: How far the front of the device is from an object.
Set the mimimum threshold to determine if a new reading is signal or noise.
children.title: Noise Threshold
Proximity Probe

children.summary: Used to record temperature. Implementation depends on the device and does not exist on all devices. Some will record temperature of battery, others temperature of CPU or environment.
Set the mimimum threshold to determine if a new reading is signal or noise.
children.title: Noise Threshold
Temperature Probe

children.summary: Provides basic descriptive statistics for incoming accelerometer data.
children.title: Accelerometer Statistics

children.summary: Provides basic descriptive statistics for incoming gyroscope data.
children.title: Gyroscope Statistics

children.summary: Provides basic descriptive statistics for incoming gyroscope data.
children.title: Magnetic Field Statistics

children.summary: Provides basic descriptive statistics for incoming light sensor data.
children.title: Light Sensor Statistics

children.summary: Provides basic descriptive statistics for incoming pressure sensor data.
children.title: Pressure Sensor Statistics

children.summary: Provides basic descriptive statistics for incoming proximity sensor data.
children.title: Proximity Sensor Statistics

children.summary: Provides basic descriptive statistics for incoming temperature sensor data.
children.title: Temperature Sensor Statistics

children.summary: Provides basic frequency analyses for incoming accelerometer data.
children.title: Accelerometer Frequencies

children.summary: Information about the type and current state of the battery in the device.
children.title: Battery Probe

children.summary: Observes whether the mobile phone is idle or in use.
children.title: Current Call State

children.summary: Details about the specific hardware the device is running, including component identifiers.
children.title: Hardware Information Probe

children.summary: Current network configuration of the active interface.
children.title: Network Configuration Probe

children.summary: Summarizes the current state of the Purple Robot app, including the amount of data to be transmitted to the server.
children.title: Purple Robot Health

children.summary: Details about the apps the device is currently running.
children.title: Running Software Probe

children.summary: Records when the screen turns off and on.
children.title: Screen Probe

children.summary: Collects information about software installed and running on the current device.
children.title: Software Information

children.summary: Records telephony hardware, software, and account information.
children.title: Telephony Probe

children.summary: Indicates whether the device is in use.
children.title: Device In Use

children.summary: Detects Bluetooth devices within range.
When set, the app will hash the caller's name and phone number when collecting that data.
children.title: Obfuscate Device Details
Visible Bluetooth Probe

children.summary: Records available wireless (WiFi) access points and relevant connection information.
children.title: WiFi Probe

children.summary: Observes visible GPS satellites to help determine location, cloud cover, and other information.
children.title: Visible Satellites

children.summary: Acquires the latest weather data for the user's location from a Weather Underground station.
children.title: Current Weather Conditions

children.summary: Calculates whether it is day or night and the times for sunrise and sunset.
children.title: Sunrise & Sunset Feature

children.summary: Calculates the distance from significant locations in the local address book.
When set, the app will hash the name and addresses of locations when collecting that data.
children.title: Obfuscate Addresses & Place Names
Significant Location Distances Sensor

children.summary: Generates statistics and counts about phone, SMS, and other communication uses.
When set, the app will hash the name and phone numbers observed when collecting that data.
children.title: Obfuscate Call Details
Call & Message Info

children.summary: Records basic information from the local calendar, including elements like the day of the week, week of the month, month of the year, etc.
children.title: Date Calendar Sensor

children.summary: Generates aggregate statistics that describe the user's phone call activity, include counts of daily calls.
children.title: Call History Statistics

children.summary: Counts the number of nearby location types.
children.title: Google Places

children.summary: Retrieves information from the your online Fitbit profile.
children.title: Fitbit Measurements

children.summary: Generates random floating point numbers at a 4Hz frequency for diagnostic purposes.
Save & transmit random values generated to the remote server.
children.title: Retain Data
Random Noise Probe

children.summary: System sound used for audible notifications when not otherwise specified.
children.title: Notification Sound

children.summary: Default pattern used to provide haptic feedback (vibrations) for events.
children.title: Haptic Feedback Pattern

children.summary: Do not display sanity check notifications.
children.title: Mute Status Notifications

children.summary: When probes are disabled, specifies whether to display the default placeholder image or to leave the area empty.
children.title: Enable Background Image

children.summary: Query any third-party update services (HockeyApp) for application updates & bug fixes.
children.title: Check for Updates on Launch

children.summary: Persist data prior to transmission in an publicly-accessible location on the device.
children.title: Use External Storage

children.summary: Save data transmitted to the server on the local device for later review.
children.title: Archive Transmitted Data

children.summary: Encrypt the collected sensor data on the local device and in transmissions.
children.title: Encrypt Sensor Data

children.summary: Accept all SSL certificates, regardless whether they validate properly.
children.title: Accept All SSL Certificates

children.summary: URL of the HTTP endpoint where sensor data will be logged.
children.title: HTTP Upload Endpoint

children.summary: Disable uploads using cellular and other mobile connection types.
children.title: Only Use WiFi Connection

children.summary: Override the default upload intervals with a constant interval.
children.title: HTTP Upload Interval

children.summary: Override the default upload payload size with a constant size.
children.title: HTTP Upload Size

children.summary: Permit logging of diagnostic events for tracking device functionality & user behavior.
children.title: Enable Event Logging

children.summary: HTTP or HTTPS endpoint providing logging services.
children.title: Log Upload Endpoint

children.summary: Include last known location with log events.
children.title: Log Location Data

children.summary: Only upload log events when a wireless LAN is available.
children.title: Only Use WiFi Connection

children.summary: How frequently logs may be uploaded to the server.
children.title: Log Upload Interval

children.summary: How often configuration should be refreshed from the server.
children.title: Refresh Interval
